alert.note: Alert for Holmes; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 15 at 3:50PM EDT until August 15 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Central Holmes County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 250 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northwest of Bonifay, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chipley, Graceville, Bonifay, Caryville, Esto, Westville, Noma, Miller Crossroads, Richter Crossroads, Holmes County Airport, Bethlehem, Tendil Crossing, Gritney, Holland Crossroads, Ards Crossroads, Cobb Crossroads, Hulaw, Izagora, Browntown and Noma Junction. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
